languages.text: "Если бы мы не разгромили моторных вандалов, они могли бы выступить на стороне культа, но хотя бы эту угрозу мы успели отвратить".
"If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."
languages.original_text: "Если бы мы не разгромили моторных вандалов, они могли бы выступить на стороне культа, но хотя бы эту угрозу мы успели отвратить".

traits.locale_text: "If we would not have crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult, but at least we could ward off this particular threat in time."
"If we would not have crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult, but at least we could ward off this particular threat in time."
"If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

"If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

languages.text: “如果我们当初没有消灭引擎破坏者，他们这种时候很可能会站在邪教那边。但幸好，我们已经提前消灭了这个威胁。”
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: “如果我们当初没有消灭引擎破坏者，他们这种时候很可能会站在邪教那边。但幸好，我们已经提前消灭了这个威胁。”
“如果我们当初没有消灭引擎破坏者，他们这种时候很可能会站在邪教那边。但幸好，我们已经提前消灭了这个威胁。”

languages.text: «Si no hubiéramos aplastado a los Vándalos del Motor, podrían haberse unido a las filas del culto. Al menos nos libramos de esa amenaza a tiempo».
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: «Si no hubiéramos aplastado a los Vándalos del Motor, podrían haberse unido a las filas del culto. Al menos nos libramos de esa amenaza a tiempo».

languages.text: 「私たちがエンジン破壊者を潰さなければ、奴らはカルトに仲間入りしていたかもしれないが、いずれにせよこの差し迫った脅威を時間内に追い払うことができた」
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちがエンジン破壊者を潰さなければ、奴らは魔女団に仲間入りしていたかもしれないが、いずれにせよこの差し迫った脅威を時間内に追い払うことができた」
「私たちがエンジン破壊者を潰さなければ、奴らは魔女団に仲間入りしていたかもしれないが、いずれにせよこの差し迫った脅威を時間内に追い払うことができた」

languages.text: « Si nous n'avions pas massacré les Vandales mécaniques, ils auraient pu rejoindre les rangs des cultistes... Au moins avons-nous pu éliminer cette menace-là à temps. »
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous n'avions pas massacré les Vandales mécaniques, ils auraient pu rejoindre les rangs des cultistes... Au moins avons-nous pu éliminer cette menace-là à temps. »

languages.text: "Hätten wir die Maschinenvandalen nicht vernichtet, hätten sie sich den Reihen des Kults anschließen können. Immerhin haben wir diese Gefahr rechtzeitig abgewehrt."
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: "Hätten wir die Maschinenvandalen nicht vernichtet, hätten sie sich den Reihen des Kults anschließen können. Immerhin haben wir diese Gefahr rechtzeitig abgewehrt."
"Hätten wir die Maschinenvandalen nicht zerstört, hätten sie sich den Reihen des Kults anschließen können. Doch diese Gefahr zumindest konnten wir rechtzeitig abwehren."

languages.text: "Makine Vandalları'nı alt etmeseydik tarikat saflarına katılabilirlerdi. En azından zamanında bu tehdidin üstesinden gelmeyi başardık."
languages.original_text: "If we had not crushed the Engine Vandals, they could have joined the ranks of the cult. At least we warded off that particular threat in time."

traits.locale_text: "Makine Vandalları'nı alt etmeseydik tarikat saflarına katılabilirlerdi. En azından zamanında bu tehdidin üstesinden gelmeyi başardık."
